00031 void GridOperation::GridOpChangeColumnText(wxString ColumnText, int iColumn, bool bSize)
00032 {
00033         pGrid->SetColLabelValue (iColumn,ColumnText);
00034         
00035         // check if there is enough place for the label
00036         if (bSize) 
00037         {
00038                 pGrid->AutoSizeColumn(iColumn,FALSE);
00039                 if (pGrid->GetColSize(iColumn) < 80)
00040                 {
00041                         pGrid->SetColSize (iColumn,80);
00042                 }               
00043         }
00044         
00045 }

00048 void GridOperation::GridOpSetNumberOfColumn(int iNumber)
00049 {
00050         int myNumberOfCols = pGrid->GetNumberCols();
00051         int myDiff = abs(myNumberOfCols - iNumber);
00052         
00053         // delete or add cols 
00054         if (myNumberOfCols > iNumber)
00055         {
00056                 pGrid->DeleteCols(myNumberOfCols - myDiff,myDiff);
00057         }
00058         else if (myNumberOfCols < iNumber)
00059         {
00060                 pGrid->AppendCols(myDiff);
00061         }
00062         
00063         // delete all rows...
00064         pGrid->DeleteRows(0,pGrid->GetNumberRows(),FALSE);
00065         
00066         
00067 }

00071 void GridOperation::GridOpAddDataRow(int iColumn, wxArrayString * myArray)
00072 {
00073         // append a new row
00074         pGrid->AppendRows(1,FALSE);
00075         
00076         // get the number of rows
00077         int iRow = pGrid->GetNumberRows();
00078         
00079         for (int i=0; i<iColumn; i++)
00080          {
00081                 pGrid->SetCellValue(iRow-1,i,myArray->Item(i));
00082         }
00083 }
